entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
